actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on January 15, 1975 at 1 o'clock p.m. for the purpose of receiving such communication as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.

summary.text: Provides for a joint session of the Congress on January 15, 1975 to receive a message from the President.

titles.title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that the two Houses of Congress assemble in the Hall of the House of Representatives on January 15, 1975 at 1 o'clock p.m. for the purpose of receiving such communication as the President of the United States shall be pleased to make to them.
